forum.content:
In generally, we all were learning about the values from others. And, we usually gotta hurts and keep moving on, then the progress heals the mind and makes the attitude grow up.

If you always thought of ways to find others who helped you beat the rap, and I must say that crime never pays you definitely knew it.

The problem should be dealed with solutions, and avoid evading that. No wonder you look like the cat burglar, I mean the speed of getting away with things.

Sometimes, the "you" actually was defining all related to me. After experiencing that process, and I've been able to know it.

Therefore, the new year's resolution of mine is to do things well on every single day. If everyday is well, there's no reason explaining to these bad perspectives in the future.

Happy new year to all of you.
forum.title: To my mind. (For practice writing)
